summary.value: Draw enemy attacks using Condemn or verses

system.description:
Requirements: you must have mastered one or more Classes among Chanter and Orator.

After you sing a haunting verse, or after you succeed on an Opposed Check for your Condemn Skill, you may choose one enemy among the targets of that verse or Skill.

If you do, choose one status effect that enemy is currently suffering from: that enemy becomes bewitched until the start of your next turn or until they recover from the chosen status effect. Enemies you have bewitched must include you among the targets of their attacks and offensive spells ( @ICON[offensive] ), if able.
